name: Corpse Crawler
description:
CORPSE CRAWLER

Filthy humans have invaded your dungeon!

looking for treasure and glory I expect.... but they only come to destroy our home

Defeat their leader to save our home!

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow keys 

Pickup / putdown: e
